description: This file contains API endpoint definitions for user-related operations, including fetching the current user's profile and listing users with optional organization filtering. It utilizes FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, and custom security dependencies.

methods.name: Optional[User] _get_user_by_id(session: AsyncSession, user_id: UUID)
methods.description: Retrieves a User object from the database asynchronously based on the UUID.

methods.name: UserOut get_me( claims: dict = Depends(require_jwt_claims), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
methods.description: API endpoint to get the currently authenticated user's profile, requires JWT claims.

methods.name: List[UserOut] list_users( org_id: Optional[UUID] = Query(default=None, alias="orgId", description="Organization ID filter"), claims: dict = Depends(require_jwt_claims), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
methods.description: API endpoint to list users with optional filtering by organization ID.

ctags.name: get_me
ctags.signature: ( claims: dict = Depends(require_jwt_claims), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )

ctags.name: list_users
ctags.signature: ( org_id: Optional[UUID] = Query(default=None, alias="orgId", description="Organization ID filter"), claims: dict = Depends(require_jwt_claims), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session), )
